Newbie Helper:
The Blessing of Protection is a special protection only given to characters of level 39 or lower who have not completed the second transfer.
When you are under the Blessing of Protection, you give nor receive damage when in combat with Chaos more than 10 levels above you. However, it's important to understand that this effect does not work during battle.
Do you want to receive the protection?
[scripts_services.SupportMagic:getProtectionBlessing|Receive Blessing of Protection]
